body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, this is Tyler Alexander from Hotel Haven. May I ask for your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Amber. Can you confirm your date of birth, starting with the month and day separately?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure. My birthdate is zero six dash two zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you. And could you please provide the last four digits of your phone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course. The last four digits of my number are four five six seven.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for sharing that information, Amber. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm feeling a bit nervous about the pricing information for my upcoming stay.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand your concern, Amber. We will ensure you have a comfortable and pleasant stay. Thank you for your time today. Is there anything else you would like to discuss?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all for now. Thank you for addressing my worries.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Amber. If you have any more questions in the future, feel free to reach out. Have a great day!
